just paste this in terminal (paste in terminal is done with shift + insert, not ctrl + v)  cat /etc/X11/xorg.conf | pastebinit
i c it should be under system - preferences screen resolution
install pastebinit: run sudo apt-get install pastebinit -y in terminal or use synaptic. Then run cat /etc/X11/Xorg.conf | pastebin it and post the link here
